Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Cermak-McCormick Place
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Cermak-McCormick Place due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Cermak-McCormick Place due to signal problems. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
